search_results.title: Josiah Mortimer - Chief Reporter
search_results.snippet: Josiah Mortimer is Byline Times' Chief Reporter. He joined the title in 2023 after working in local journalism for MyLondon.

search_results.title: Josiah Mortimer's Biography
search_results.snippet: Josiah Mortimer is Chief Reporter for Byline Times. He was previously City Hall Editor for the Reach title MyLondon, and Editor at Left Foot Forward.

search_results.title: Josiah Mortimer
